release_note: New Challenges Learn how to isolate the subject of a photo from its background and unlock a new laser pointer style. Try the 2 new challenges in the Home tab under Practice and Earn Rewards.

YouTube Search Search for YouTube videos and insert them as web pages into your project. You can find the YouTube Search under Add Media Image Video from Web. Use an external camera Connect an external camera to your iPad and record videos or take photos with it. Feature available on iPads with USB C ports running iPadOS 17.

Lift a subject of a photo and copy it You can now isolate a subject of a photo on your canvas from its background and add its cutout copy to your project. Select a photo on your canvas to display the Context Menu. Select the More tab and choose Lift Subject to use it. It is also available as a Cutout tool mode which lets you tap and hold the photo to Lift Subject from it. Select the Cutout tool twice to display its modes. Available on devices running iOS 17 and iPadOS 17.

Explain Everything works on iOS and iPadOS 15 Explain Everything now requires iOS or iPadOS 15 or higher. If you re on a lower version please update your system to continue using Explain Everything.
Explain Everything works on iOS and iPadOS 15 Explain Everything now requires iOS or iPadOS 15 or higher. If you re on a lower version please update your system to continue using Explain Everything.

Template picker s refreshed look We ve rearranged the template picker a bit. It s now easier to navigate and find the template you re looking for. No mind tricks just a cleaner interface. Eye pleasing loading No one likes to wait for things to load. Especially when the number of screens and statuses makes it feel chaotic. We ve tidied it up to make it more pleasant. You ll now see just a single screen with a delightful new animation. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Template picker s refreshed look We ve rearranged the template picker a bit. It s now easier to navigate and find the template you re looking for. No mind tricks just a cleaner interface. Eye pleasing loading No one likes to wait for things to load. Especially when the number of screens and statuses makes it feel chaotic. We ve tidied it up to make it more pleasant. You ll now see just a single screen with a delightful new animation. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Web Video Links Settings and Quick Sharing Set the video aspect ratio and resolution of your video select which slides to include control behavior for slides without recordings and more. You can also quickly share the link to Google Classroom and Microsoft Teams after you create it. Inviting and Project Access Improvements We ve redesigned the Add people menu where you set access to your project to make it easier to use. The Invite others by email field now suggests people from your group. Access Permissions is gone from the Collaboration menu as all access settings are in a single place now. Select Add people from the Collaboration menu to see the changes. Share with Class Teachers on the Class plan can now share cloud projects with the whole class at once. This way the project will appear in the Shared with Class folder for all Student accounts in the group. Open your project select the Invite or Collaboration menu and choose Add people. Once you select the Invite others field your class will appear as a suggestion.

Web Video Links Settings and Quick Sharing Set the video aspect ratio and resolution of your video select which slides to include control behavior for slides without recordings and more. You can also quickly share the link to Google Classroom and Microsoft Teams after you create it. Inviting and Project Access Improvements We ve redesigned the Add people menu where you set access to your project to make it easier to use. The Invite others by email field now suggests people from your group. Access Permissions is gone from the Collaboration menu as all access settings are in a single place now. Select Add people from the Collaboration menu to see the changes. Share with Class Teachers on the Class plan can now share cloud projects with the whole class at once. This way the project will appear in the Shared with Class folder for all Student accounts in the group. Open your project select the Invite or Collaboration menu and choose Add people. Once you select the Invite others field your class will appear as a suggestion.

Add images from Google Image Search Choose from images and photos published on the web with Safe Search enabled. You can now find Google Image Search in the Add Media menu. Get work done fast with keyboard shortcuts We ve updated reworked and added new shortcuts to make keyboard fans work easier. Check out the list in the More menu. We also got rid of some minor pesky bugs and issues.

Add images from Google Image Search Choose from images and photos published on the web with Safe Search enabled. You can now find Google Image Search in the Add Media menu. Get work done fast with keyboard shortcuts We ve updated reworked and added new shortcuts to make keyboard fans work easier. Check out the list in the More menu. We also got rid of some minor pesky bugs and issues.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Test your skills in new challenges Discover features and learn tricks through a new series of challenges. 3 fresh interactive projects will put you in the role of a gallery curator an artist ornithologist and a quiz participant. Complete them all and get a new reward. One tap to erase all drawings You can now get rid of all drawings and annotations on the canvas with one press of a button. Select and hold the background with the Hand Tool to reveal the menu. Choose Clear all drawings to wipe your board clean. A plethora of bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Invite to your board with a QR CODE You can now display a QR CODE for others to join your collaboration. Once they scan the CODE with their cameras they ll jump right into your project. You can find the QR CODE in the Collaboration menu of your cloud projects. Faster Whiteboard Live navigation The new project options are available immediately after you select your Whiteboard Live scenario. Less taps quicker setup. New Straighten gesture You can now tap an object with two fingers to straighten it.
Bug fixes and improvements related to drawing and object selection.
Edpuzzle integration update We ve updated the Edpuzzle integration and fixed some issues so you can continue app smashing it with Explain Everything.

Consistent Line Width Toggle You can now switch between static and scaling pen widths when using the Draw Tool and Highlighter. The option is available in the Pen Size picker and in Settings under the Editing tab. For all those who found the smallest pen size too big you can disable the Consistent Line Width setting to make your lines as thin as they were before the big update. If you d like to keep the setting enabled you can zoom out a bit to get the same effect.

Consistent Line Width Toggle You can now switch between static and scaling pen widths when using the Draw Tool and Highlighter. The option is available in the Pen Size picker and in Settings under the Editing tab. For all those who found the smallest pen size too big you can disable the Consistent Line Width setting to make your lines as thin as they were before the big update. If you d like to keep the setting enabled you can zoom out a bit to get the same effect.

In this update we focused on aligning Explain Everything s design more with industry standards for managing your whiteboard content. Arranging and moving multiple things at once is now much easier and no longer requires you to switch tools. Edit and arrange with Context Menu Select an object with the Hand Tool to display the new Context Menu for fast editing and better control. Group with Hand Tool With the Hand Tool active swipe across the canvas to select multiple objects and move or edit them. Consistent line width The Draw Tool and Highlighter now keep their line width consistent within a certain zoom range. Add links to objects You can now add web links to objects so you or your audience can access them right from the canvas. New background editor The slide background editor has a brand new interface and now displays the contents of your canvas.
Готові ділитися ідеями Explain Everything is now available in Ukrainian! Bug fixes and performance improvements
Готові ділитися ідеями Explain Everything is now available in Ukrainian!

New Plans Better Fit Explain Everything has a new subscription plan: Solo Teacher. It is a dedicated more affordable offer for teachers and educators. It lets them use Explain Everything on their own with no limits. So if you d like to create videos and have your personal media powered whiteboard this one s for you. The Solo Teacher plan features unlimited projects with unlimited slides no restriction to video recording length and 5 GB of Explain Drive cloud storage. The new plan is a yearly subscription and it comes with a 7 day free trial if you haven t used it already . Alongside the new plan we ve also renamed the Individual plan to Pro. This is to better reflect the difference between the two plans. If you re already on a paid plan don t worry it will all function as it used to. Last but not least the recording length limit for the Free plan is now 3 minutes. We felt that the previous 1 minute limit was too short to explore the recording possibilities. More exciting updates are coming soon! Stay tuned!
Bug fixes and stability improvements
You can now loop GIFs and Videos in cloud projects Bug fixes and stability improvements

NEW Whiteboard Live assistants Quickly present your whiteboard using one of the three brand new assistants. In the classroom online need to explain something to that one student at this very moment the assistants will help you set it up so you can focus on what s important. Check them out in the Home tab. Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and multiple small improvements
Bug fixes and multiple small improvements

Slides create chapters when posting to YouTube When you export to YouTube Explain Everything will add slides timestamps to the description. This will create chapters in the posted video. Bug fixes and multiple small improvements
Insert video to the timeline When adding a video you can now include it as a clip in the Timeline to make them into a recording right away. Bug fixes and multiple small improvements
Arrow Shape Improvements A new Slim Arrow joins the Shapes menu. You can also control the width of all arrow shapes on the canvas with a new handle. Bug fixes and stability improvements

New Challenges Learn about and practice some of the unique features in 3 brand new challenges. Complete them all to unlock a new Laser Pointer style. Duplicate Cloud Projects You can now create copies of your projects on Explain Drive. Open Project Details select More Options and choose Duplicate to create a copy of your project. Bug fixes and stability improvements

Resize Rotate and Scale with Handles To all trackpad mouse and precision enthusiasts: there is a new way of resizing rotating and scaling content on your canvas. You can now use handles to do all of the above. Select an object once with the Hand Tool to activate the handles. Oh and the Inspector shortcut is there too! Just so you don t have to select it from the Toolbar.

You can now use handles to do all of the above. Select an object once with the Hand Tool to activate the handles. Oh and the Inspector shortcut is there too! Just so you don t have to select it from the Toolbar.
New Shapes For all the geometry enthusiasts and math teachers you can now find new triangle and quadrangle shapes in the Shape Tool. Bug fixes and stability improvements
New Shapes For all the geometry enthusiasts and math teachers you can now find new triangle and quadrangle shapes in the Shape Tool. Bug fixes and stability improvements
New Shapes For all the geometry enthusiasts and math teachers you can now find new triangle and quadrangle shapes in the Shape Tool. Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and stability improvements

Sync status for Cloud Projects While in a Cloud Project you ll see the status of syncing content after adding something new. If you try to leave the project while syncing you ll get a message reminding you about it. This way you ll no longer accidentally interrupt syncing content and you ll be sure that what you ve added will be there later. Bug fixes and stability improvements

Insert 3D Models from Sketchfab Add high quality community made 3D models to your canvas via the new integration with Sketchfab. You can find it in Add Media 3D Objects. Once you add a model you can select it with the Hand Tool and then rotate it. NOTE: A Sketchfab account is required in order to use the integration and download 3D models. Not every model is free to download and any purchases made are managed by Sketchfab. More Document Page Locking Options When importing a document you can now lock movement attributes of its pages. This way you can control pages ability to move on the canvas before you add them. You can later change that with the Inspector.

Whiteboard together during FaceTime calls with SharePlay When using FaceTime on iOS and iPadOS 15 you can now jump onto a whiteboard and take everyone in your call with you. Start or enter an Explain Everything cloud project during a FaceTime call to immediately invite everyone to join you. You can also share your screen while in a local project if you don t want to invite them to work with you. NOTE: In order to receive the invitation or see your screen people in your call also need to be on a device running at least iOS or iPadOS 15.1.
Learn and raise your Explain Everything skills by completing interactive challenges! You can access the Challenges menu from the Home Screen last item .
Learn and raise your Explain Everything skills by completing interactive challenges! You can access the Challenges menu from the Home Screen last item .

Faster Scribble Immediately write on top of Text Boxes and Sticky Notes with your Apple Pencil without having to activate them. With the Text Tool or Hand Tool active Explain Everything will recognize the text field underneath when using Apple Pencil. Center Stage in New Videos You can enable Apple s Center Stage for New Video objects. This way the camera will follow you and you ll stay in the frame. Devices currently supporting Center Stage: iPad Pro 12.9 inch 5th generation iPad Pro 11 inch 3rd generation iPad 10.2 inch 9th generation iPad mini 8.3 inch 6th generation . Explain Everything works on iOS and iPadOS 13 Devices running iOS or iPadOS lower than 13 no longer receive Explain Everything updates. If you re on these versions please update your system to continue using Explain Everything.

Final release for iOS iPadOS 11 and 12 With the next release devices running iOS iPadOS 11 and 12 will no longer receive Explain Everything updates. If you re on iOS iPadOS 11 or 12 please update your system to continue using Explain Everything. This version contains small changes to ensure compatibility with upcoming releases so you can update your system in the meantime.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Custom Workspace Personalize tools and interface elements for your project with the brand new Custom option available in the Workspaces menu under the Undo button. Control Participants Tools in a Collaboration Choose the tools available for collaboration participants and create your own collaboration scenarios. You can set them in your cloud projects under CODE Scenario Customize. Muted Microphone Notification If your microphone is muted during recording and collaboration Explain Everything will let you know about this when you try to speak.
Resize control points are now available for the placeholder objects. Multiple bug fixes and minor improvements.

The Equation Editor now retains the color of the Text Tool. You can now change the name of a Web Video Link or Project by tapping on it in the project details. Multiple bug fixes and minor improvements.

Sticky Notes Add Sticky Notes to your whiteboard for fast labeling and notetaking. They come in 8 beautiful colors and you can find them in the Add Media menu. Sign in with Office 365 You can now use the Office 365 sign in option to create or access your account. Other changes You can now select the destination folder when copying your project to Explain Drive. We improved the visibility of selected slides in the Export menu. Dozens of bug fixes and minor improvements.

Sticky Notes Add Sticky Notes to your whiteboard for fast labeling and notetaking. They come in 8 beautiful colors and you can find them in the Add Media menu. Sign in with Office 365 You can now use the Office 365 sign in option to create or access your account. Other changes You can now select the destination folder when copying your project to Explain Drive. We improved the visibility of selected slides in the Export menu. Dozens of bug fixes and minor improvements.

Fix for performance issues in some Text Object usage scenarios. New Export Improvements A quick slide selection menu now gives you a better overview of the slides in your project. Select the number of slides under the Export Preview to access it. The Export Preview now displays the slide you re currently on. You can now switch between paper size standards when selecting the Page size in the Export Document Options. Other changes You can now Zoom and Pan with two fingers also when using the Eraser Text or Shape Tool. The Copy cmd C and Paste cmd V keyboard shortcuts are now working as intended. Multiple other improvements and fixes.

New Export Improvements A quick slide selection menu now gives you a better overview of the slides in your project. Select the number of slides under the Export Preview to access it. The Export Preview now displays the slide you re currently on. You can now switch between paper size standards when selecting the Page size in the Export Document Options. Other changes You can now Zoom and Pan with two fingers also when using the Eraser Text or Shape Tool. The Copy cmd C and Paste cmd V keyboard shortcuts are now working as intended. Multiple other improvements and fixes.

Export has a new look and easy to access settings you can now preview the exported file and set your export options directly from the menu to save time and have more control over the final result. Export as GIF now also available from the Export menu. It allows you to export a whole slide as a GIF with access to the preview and more settings. You can now move entire folders from your device to Explain Drive.

Export has a new look and easy to access settings you can now preview the exported file and set your export options directly from the menu to save time and have more control over the final result. Export as GIF now also available from the Export menu. It allows you to export a whole slide as a GIF with access to the preview and more settings. You can now move entire folders from your device to Explain Drive.
Support for Magic Keyboard and trackpad gestures. To display the list of shortcuts press and hold the Command Cmd key on your keyboard. Multiple bug fixes performance and usage improvements.
Multiple bug fixes performance and usage improvements.
Access all your account settings in one place through an updated user profile screen Change background color directly using the bucket fill tool Lots of smaller bug fixes and improvements

Start with Videos and GIFs inserted on the timeline. Select New Project Files and import a video or GIF. It will appear on the timeline ready for annotating and scrubbing. You can change this behaviour in Settings. The Explain Everything Widget is now available! Enter recent projects or create a new one directly from the Home Screen or Today View on your iPad or iPhone. Hyperlinks now work in text fields. The animation that indicated the grouping of drawings felt too intrusive so we got rid of it. A lot of other minor bug fixes and improvements e.g Magic Keyboard .

New privacy options in collaboration: You can now hide participants names and the collaboration CODE. Custom iOS fonts are now available from the Text Tool. Improved compatibility with online conferencing tools like Zoom. A lot of other minor bug fixes and improvements.

New privacy options in collaboration: You can now hide participants names and the collaboration CODE. Custom iOS fonts are now available from the Text Tool. Improved compatibility with online conferencing tools like Zoom. A lot of other minor bug fixes and improvements.

You can now set a default mic setting for when you join collaborations. This way Explain Everything won t ask you about it every time you enter a cloud project. Multiple bug fixes and usability improvements

Animated GIFs are in! You can now add GIFs to your whiteboard and use them just like videos. New GIPHY integration search from the world s largest library of animated GIFs and use them in your projects. Send videos to Edpuzzle you can now choose Edpuzzle as a destination of your video when sharing it via Share Export Video. New Zoom button feature when you tap the Zoom button while active it will cycle between showing all contents of the slide and moving back to the center at 100 zoom level. Scan your documents with the new Scan Document option. You can find it in the Add Media menu available on iOS 13 and higher . You can now set Ruler s angle by typing it in. Cloud project size is now visible in the Project Details. Dozens of bug fixes and other small yet important improvements

New Zoom button feature: when you tap the Zoom button while active it will cycle between showing all contents of the slide and moving back to the center at 100 zoom level. Animated GIFs are in! You can now add GIFs to your whiteboard and use them just like videos. Scan your documents with the new Scan Document option. You can find it in the Add Media menu available on iOS 13 and higher . You can now set Ruler s angle by typing it in. Cloud project size is now visible in the Project Details. Dozens of bug fixes and other small yet important improvements.

Introducing the new Follow Me mode. This powerful set of features will help you moderate lead and engage your audience. From now on you will be able to control what others see on your whiteboard and how they interact with it. The new Camera Frame gives you the ability to control which part of your project gets recorded while giving you access to all the other tools. Precise Camera controls for a more productive video making process. From now on you are able to set and control the camera size depth position and movement. Simplified Zoom that declutters the interface. The Stealth Mode reset button and Zoom lock toggle have been redesigned or moved to other places in the app.

Improved and more intuitive drawing and annotating. From now on drawings will turn into separate movable objects when the space between the drawn lines is big enough. When drawings are close to each other they will group but can be manually ungrouped so you can move them separately. Most notifications and alerts have been rewritten so they re easier to understand and they also feature a brand new visual style. The new Guides section on the Home Screen now features free templates with step by step instructions for you to download right from the app. Group Admins can now disable cloud features for their group in the App Configuration panel on Explain Drive. We ve removed some pesky errors that used to appear when launching Explain Everything via external links. It is now more seamless. YouTube and GDrive access permissions are now separate from Sign in so you can now choose when to enable them and which YouTube channel you d like to use. Objects set as the background now have the same set of actions available in the Inspector as when they re not in the background. Numerous other small issues have been sent to the nether realm

For Danish folks. Sign in with Skoletube Børnetube and Studietube now fully take advantage of the Unilogin service options. Multiple other small bug fixes and improvements.
bug fixes

You can now resize text boxes and shapes with multiple resize points for better control and precision. Increased space for names of folders and projects. Explain Everything will now only crop names longer than two lines. On device video export is now much faster on the latest devices. Try exporting a project as a video and see for yourself! We resolved WebDAV import and export issues. Multiple other small bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes
Signup screen is now brand new and features example projects for you to try out. Some unintended file types were opened in Explain Everything from the Files app. This is no longer the case.

The local video Export engine has been improved so your videos will now export faster. Now once you sign out you ll be taken back to the initial welcome screen for easy sign in. Creating a new project when inside a folder will now add it to that folder immediately. We ve fixed an issue that was causing the pen and highlighter to act unexpectedly when used together.

High Quality Multimedia Clipart Custom Clipart now maintains the highest possible image quality and allows for all supported media types to be stored in your custom library. Even videos and audio files. GIF Improvements Your GIFs now export in higher quality and with smoother playback. We also fixed a couple annoying bits that required you to prolong your recording to export a GIF with the proper length. We ve updated OneDrive integration and have fixed some issues along the way. Mostly changes under the hood but for those of you who were waiting for them this is it.

NEW Learn with Experts Meet the most experienced explainers see how they use Explain Everything every day and how it makes their work easier. Includes free step by step templates for you to download right from the app! We ve updated Box integration and have fixed some issues along the way. Mostly changes under the hood but for those of you who were waiting for them this is it. Fixed some minor issues to make your experience more pleasant.

NEW Learn with Experts Meet the most experienced explainers see how they use Explain Everything every day and how it makes their work easier. Includes free step by step templates for you to download right from the app! We ve updated Box integration and have fixed some issues along the way. Mostly changes under the hood but for those of you who were waiting for them this is it. Fixed some minor issues to make your experience more pleasant.
Dark Mode Make your Explain Everything Whiteboard dark by using the iOS 13 s Dark Mode settings. New login options! You can now use Sign in with Apple and Log in with Clever.

Open and edit projects directly in your cloud storage. If you keep your Explain Everything projects on a cloud repository outside the app you can now open them using Files. When you re finished editing your project Explain Everything will automatically save it to the original location. This also lets teachers send and receive Explain Everything projects as Schoolwork assignments.

Forgot to record something No need to redo the whole thing anymore! You can use the new Insert recording mode to squeeze in any new content. Did you have a lot of interactive whiteboard files made with other programs You can now import .iwb files as Explain Everything projects instead of rebuilding them from scratch!

We ve added a brand new set of high quality clipart and updated the library! It s now much easier to find the right image thanks to the new search option. Share your screen to other apps with a quick access to the Broadcast option in the Share menu. You can create a screen recording with it too! When you connect to an external screen Explain Everything will let you know about it and allow you to quickly switch between external screen modes.

We ve added a brand new set of high quality clipart and updated the library! It s now much easier to find the right image thanks to the new search option. Share your screen to other apps with a quick access to the Broadcast option in the Share menu. You can create a screen recording with it too! When you connect to an external screen Explain Everything will let you know about it and allow you to quickly switch between external screen modes.

We ve added a brand new set of high quality clipart and updated the library! It s now much easier to find the right image thanks to the new search option. Share your screen to other apps with a quick access to the Broadcast option in the Share menu. You can create a screen recording with it too! When you connect to an external screen Explain Everything will let you know about it and allow you to quickly switch between external screen modes.

Find the right photo for your project. The new Unsplash library is now in the Add Media menu where you can choose from thousands of beautiful images or photos. Saving copies of your local projects to Explain Drive is now much easier. You can save copies directly from the Project Menu while in the project or using the Move option in your library. Explain Everything s tolerance for SVG files wasn t the greatest. We ve spent some time on that and now it munches them like a grown up would.

Quickly change your workspace layout. With the Workspace Switcher you can toggle between Standard Simple and the brand new Presenter layouts right from your project. Explain Everything projects now show up in the iOS Search so you can get to them in a jiffy. Add files from Slack to your project directly in Explain Everything. Toggling between apps wasn t exactly a productive use of your time. Consider yourself toggle free.

What s New New Explainers now can try out all the whiteboarding features without registering. Image Editor went through a makeover and is now back on the catwalk showing off its brand new icons. Fixes Microphone should no longer automatically unmute when joining cloud projects. Other minor bug fixes.

Add audio clips to your recording. Drag and drop pre recorded narration or existing background sounds into the Timeline for more creative flexibility. Available on iOS 11 and higher. Resolution of images exported with Share Export Image is now much higher. Fixes: Straightening objects with the Hand Tool s double tap gesture wasn t working as intended for some angles. We won t argue with 90 degree angles. Now they re always right. We dealt with many small but annoying bugs so your work in Explain Everything should be more pleasant.

Add audio clips to your recording. Drag and drop pre recorded narration or existing background sounds into the Timeline for more creative flexibility. Available on iOS 11 and higher. Resolution of images exported with Share Export Image is now much higher. Fixes: Straightening objects with the Hand Tool s double tap gesture wasn t working as intended for some angles. We won t argue with 90 degree angles. Now they re always right. We dealt with many small but annoying bugs so your work in Explain Everything should be more pleasant.

Added awesome new video hints to welcome new users to Explain Everything. If you re a longtime user and want to see them anyway open the three dots menu and select Video Hints. Got questions We got answers. A brand new in depth help center has been added to assist you. Access it by tapping the three dots menu . Tired of forgetting your CODEs Well now your last CODE is saved for you! Every user has a Last Used Codes list. Fixes: There was a bug causing a popping sound when using an external microphone so we took the stage and won that battle mic drop

Added awesome new video hints to welcome new users to Explain Everything. If you re a longtime user and want to see them anyway open the three dots menu and select Video Hints. Got questions We got answers. A brand new in depth help center has been added to assist you. Access it by tapping the three dots menu . Tired of forgetting your CODEs Well now your last CODE is saved for you! Every user has a Last Used Codes list. Fixes: There was a bug causing a popping sound when using an external microphone so we took the stage and won that battle mic drop

More freedom for project participants in view only mode. They can now move around the canvas using Zoom and switch between slides. No need to ask the project s owner about the CODE multiple times. Join with CODE fields now remember and suggest the last 5 CODEs you used to connect to a project. If you fancy a background color with your desired HEX or RGB value check out the new option in the Custom Color template. By the way you can find the Custom Color background picker in the Slide Sorter too. Control automatic rotations precisely. You can now set Inspector s auto rotation speed by providing the RPM value. Additionally multiple bugs with auto rotations during recording were fixed. Fixes When saving a project and inviting people to it Explain Everything would ask whether you d like to overwrite the project again. While we appreciate hospitality it felt a bit overzealous so we scratched the unnecessary question. Some custom clipart for group accounts weren t loading properly and required relogging to fix it. We re not fans of workarounds or bugs like this one so it s no longer the case. A bug was preventing video object scrubbing when it was done in a cloud project. That s been taken care of too.
Invite with email now you can send email invitations also to people that doesn t have Explain Everything account yet.

Create projects with custom background colors straight away. Start from Template and select Custom Color. The image quality of objects created with the Cutout Tool is now higher thanks to some engineering magic. You can now Export GIFs from cloud projects. We squashed some minor bugs here and there.

5.2.6 Update Sharing is caring. The GDrive integration now features team folders. What s New in Explain Everything 5.2 Your cloud projects are now always available for editing to you and anyone you ve invited. Start your ongoing cloud collaborations with the new Invite button. Guests can now join your collaborations with no account required. Invite them with a link or CODE and you ll be working together in no time. We made sure everyone can join your cloud project from a browser with the new Explain Everything s online whiteboard. Web Video Link fiesta! Web Video Links are now optional and a single project can have multiple of them. Redesigned project details help you stay organized with Web Video Links and people you invited. New insert document layouts. Add document pages horizontally vertically in a grid or as a stack. New Timeline lets you take your video editing skills to the next level.

minor improvements
project orientation simply rotate the device to choose portrait or landscape

What s New Start with Templates Explain Everything now features a wide range of templates you can choose from when starting a new project. Personalize the New Project menu and add your own templates to it. Bug Fixes If you registered with an email from a domain that was already subscribed the amount of trial days left would appear. We got rid of this bug so you don t feel haunted with irrelevant information. We re adding it to the list of spooky decorations for the next Halloween party.

Hand Tool Zoom Option Zooming on the entire canvas with the Hand Tool can now be disabled in the Hand Tool menu. Tap on the Hand Tool when selected to reveal the option. Bluetooth Audio Playback Quality Improvement Using bluetooth audio devices with Explain Everything will no longer cause the playback quality to decrease.

Interface adjustments for iPhone X Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Drawing improvements Drawing is now smoother and more responsive thanks to improvements in Explain Everything s drawing algorithm. Exporting adjustments Slight adjustments in the export flow make it more intuitive now. Bug fixes
Export Animated GIF in HD quality Import TIFF images Drag Drop for group of object Collaboration faster joining Various bug fixes and improvements

iOS 11 Support Explain Everything is now compatible with iOS 11. Drag and Drop benefit from an ability to drag and drop files between different apps. New Gestures use new gestures in Explain Everything with the Hand Tool selected to make your workflow even faster. Tap on an object once to edit it. Tap and hold to open the Inspector. Double tap to straighten an object. Use triple tap to group and ungroup overlapping objects. New Navigation use the new navigation bar in the record screen to access your Profile Rename Quick Save Collaborate on Share and Close projects more easily. Hide and reveal the bar when creating a project. Additional Improvements: Now you can set the inserted browser to load desktop versions of websites. Toggle drag and drop and touch and hold gestures in the Hand Tool options. New visibility icons for Cloud Projects. Integration with Files app. See a list of all users who viewed your project uploaded to the Discover portal.

iOS 11 Support Explain Everything is now compatible with iOS 11. Drag and Drop benefit from an ability to drag and drop files between different apps. Double tap to straighten an object. Use triple tap to group and ungroup overlapping objects. New Navigation use the new navigation bar in the record screen to access your Profile Rename Quick Save Collaborate on Share and Close projects more easily. Hide and reveal the bar when creating a project. Additional Improvements: Now you can set the inserted browser to load desktop versions of websites. Toggle drag and drop and touch and hold gestures in the Hand Tool options. New visibility icons for Cloud Projects. Integration with Files app. See a list of all users who viewed your project uploaded to the Discover portal.

Instant Alpha in the Image Editor Removing backgrounds is easier than ever. Now when inserting an image you can select a color range and remove the selected color from the image with one simple gesture. Bug fixes: External Screen mode Second Screen should now work properly on iPad 3. The app should no longer crash when adding multiple PDF pages to a single slide.

iPhone landscape orientation is back as promised! Undo redo during collaboration Improved search Pull image clipart from Web safe search Apple Pencil pressure sensitivity switch settings Bug fixes What was new in 4.1: Export from the Timeline as GIF or video select a part of the Timeline and export it as animated GIF or video. SVG image support insert SVG images and zoom and scale without losing image quality. Video Overlay add streaming video to your slides to provide additional instructions or references. Group App Configurator for Admins create and deploy default settings to your group with one click through the Explain Everything Admin panel. Search in cloud sources use search function while browsing cloud sources to find your files quickly. Japanese translation New insert object menu Locked objects no longer prevent objects behind them to be immovable Add to cliparts has a new animation to indicate that the object was added Locking an object will prevent it from getting erased when using the Eraser Text Tool now has the Auto Group option in its menu It is now possible to insert music videos via Existing Audio option in the Insert object menu

Export from the Timeline as GIF or video now you can select a part of the Timeline and export it as animated GIF or video. SVG image support insert SVG images and zoom and scale without losing image quality. Video Overlay add streaming video to your slides to provide additional instructions or references. Group App Configurator for Admins create and deploy default settings to your group with one click through your Explain Everything Admin panel. Search in cloud sources use search function while browsing cloud sources to find your files quickly. Japanese translation Explain Everything is now available in Japanese language Additional Improvements New insert object menu Locked objects will no longer prevent objects behind them to be immovable Add to cliparts have a new animation to indicate that the object was added Locking an object will prevent it from getting erased when using the Eraser Text Tool now has the Auto Group option in its menu It is now possible to insert music videos via Existing Audio option in the Insert object menu Bug fixes

Interface Improvements Move tool menus use additional Color Pickers access Settings from the Record Screen and much more. Ruler In the Draw Tool add a ruler to help draw straight edges and lines Illuminated Laser Sword Pointer This popular pointer has been redesigned and added back to the app! Additional Apple Pencil Support Use Zoom and Pan two finger gestures while the Draw Tool is active and you are using an Apple Pencil. Audio Fade Fade audio on the timeline Audio Object Visibility Audio Objects can now be hidden in your exported video Additional import support Final Argument files can be imported

Pencil New drawing style available in Draw Tool Eraser Erase parts of previously completed drawings and images too! Inserted Web Browser Recently visited sites appear when browser is inserted new option to add to favorites. Improved Apple Pencil support palm rejection Object Placeholders Now available from the insert object menu to support template creation Insert Video Overlay Guide Now available from the insert object menu. Currently accepts video file as url only a link to an actual video file or a project on Explain Everything Discover. To modify use i in bottom left corner of overlay. To remove clear the url field.

Bug fixes

Bug fixes and technical improvements

Voice chat during collaboration Snap to Object press and hold on Hand Tool to access App opens active project when returning from background Support for 3rd party keyboards Default external screen mode set to mirror Updated controls for video objects French localization Norwegian localization Option to disable 3rd party storage integrations via MDM Updated Wacom stylus support various bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Web browser recording: Added option for high frequency capturing. Want to record hi def video and other content from an embedded browser Now you can! Video broadcasting: Livestream your app screen using Apple s ReplayKit. Want to broadcast a live EE session on Periscope This is the way! Set default behaviors for inserted objects: Settings options include snap rotation add shadow and switch to Hand Tool after shape creation. Exciting we know! Clipart Selection: Insert multiple clipart images at once. You can multi select clipart objects and insert them all at once. Hooray! Custom Clipart: Add an object to the clipart gallery. Use the inspector to add any selected object s as a single clipart image that can be reused. Yay! Inspector Image Quick Share: Select object s and share as an image using the share arrow in the inspector. Import images to multiple slides: Stage each imported photo on a different slide. You can select multiple photos and add as new slides when starting a new project or in an existing one Insert File Photos . Copy objects to system clipboard: You can add objects to the iOS clipboard and use them later. Cool we know! Support for Adonit Stylus at last! Share collaboration code as an application link: long press on the record screen display of the collaboration code or from within the collaboration menu. This will make it easier for people to join a collaborative session. Invite all your friends!! Text object formatting: Change the font color and size for text characters within a single text object. This is long overdue we know!
Option to copy slide without recording Previously used clip arts remain available while offline Bug Fixes
Fixed problem of uninitiated logout

Built in clipart library Track locking Option to disable auto grouping of drawings in Draw Tool Explain Everything Discover projects viewed on Safari on an iPad can be opened directly in the application Bornetube DK integration Skoletube DK added option to keep login session

Support for Shared iPads local projects on Shared Devices are synchronized with iCloud Drive Paint Bucket Fill tool Option to show username label during collaboration Collaboration join CODE shown on animation screen next to collaboration button Ability to select multiple projects on local projects screen Text Tool remembers last font used Improved video compression time Finnish and German translations added Various bug fixes and other minor improvements

New interactive welcome tour iOS 10 compatibility Annotations on web browser retain position when scrolling Mail added as export option on first list of destinations Automated reconnection to active collaboration session when app returns from background Option to delete selected objects added to Inspector Option to clear all recordings added Various bug fixes and improvements
Bugfixes and technical improvements.

IPhone version now available Smooth object movement via timeline Smooth zooming during recording option in settings Inserted web browser supports search via address bar Paste objects with long press on empty space Various improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
School tube fix. Application name correction.

Login with Gmail account. Parental gate on by default adjustable in app settings. New subscription type for group of 5 people at 12.99 per year. Explain Everything Lesson Ideas iBook linked. Various bug fixes and improvements.
WebDAV fix.

Equation Editor Simple UI Enable option in Settings Set Custom Color with HEX RGB value Display Record Timer by slide or project new option in settings Accessibility improvements Import photos videos using system photo picker Additional line thickness added Collaboration: allow recording audio from participant devices Mute audio while recording video option Wrist guard MDM driven WebDav configuration Many other small improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Additional support for MDM deployments: Premium EDU Group License can be distributed to institutional devices via MDM. New option to insert all pages of imported document on current slide. New option to insert each page of imported document as separate slides. Ability to zoom and pan at the same time. Support for keyboard shortcuts as Cmd B Cmd I while editing text.

The shape tool has now a new option that recognizes shapes such as circles triangles squares arrows and lines and creates them automatically for you. The draw tool has a new option Draw Fill that intelligently closes and fills in hand drawn shapes. You can now cut out freeform objects using the new lasso cut tool. Improved support for the Apple Pencil on iPad Pro. Bugfixes and improvements.
Better support for Apple Pencil: line thickness depends on pressure applied eraser size depends on the angle between Pencil and the device Various small improvements. Bug fixes
Record front camera video with main recording Inspector tool allows selecting and manipulating objects within group Bug fixes
Bug fixes and user interface improvements
Collaborate over the Internet using CODES Bug fixes

Attach link to project uploaded to the Discover portal on Twitter Facebook. Invitation CODE for sponsored EDU accounts is visible on the user profile. Sharing projects directly from the project player. Drag drop projects in Discover portal. Upload to Discover preset last used sharing option. Improved performance memory usage. Various bug fixes.
Stability improvements
Improved stability.
Improved stability.
Much improved collaboration framework: reduced latency less problems with disconnection. Support for portrait mode. Support for split screen. Other various improvements and bug fixes.
